attributes.additional_details: Its against the human rights, its too expensive, and there can be better alternative
attributes.background: Stop forced hotel qurantine , wearable trackers should be introduced, if their own house is available

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same/a similar action: 

Fund and offer a COVID-19 tracking wristband as alternative to hotel quarantine:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/587903

Allow fully vaccinated people coming from red list countries to isolate at home
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/588072
